name: MixRank
headline: Data products for sales, marketing, finance, recruiting, and more.
description: MixRank processes petabytes of data every month from web crawls, Google Play Store, Apple App Store, social media, and dozens of other sources. We have hundreds of customers using our data products including Google, Amazon, Facebook, Intel, and Adobe, across industries Sales, Marketing, Finance, and Security.

founders.name: Scott Milliken, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Mathematician, coder, entrepreneur, and data enthusiast. Scott's been building and programming computers since he was 11. He skipped high school and enrolled in college at 14. He finished a BA in Mathematics at UC Berkeley in 4 semesters, starting businesses on the side to pay for school. He's written code used by tens of millions of people, and code that's processed 100's of petabytes of data.

>
# Ultra-high-frequency technographic and people data for your data teams.
## MixRank curates the world’s most updated feed of people, company, and technographic datasets. Receive updates at hourly intervals and be the first to know when the data you care about changes.
![](https://mixrank.com)
TALK TO SALES
#### Powering the world’s best data teams
![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/orcl.svg)![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/optmz.svg)![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/meta.svg)![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/intl.svg)![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/amzn.svg)![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/adb.svg)
### Get to know our data
![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/device-mobile-speaker-1.svg)
20M+ iOS & Android apps
## Mobile App & SDK Data
> Hundreds of top mobile app technology companies, publishers and agencies use MixRank to grow sales, react to competitors, plan market strategies and retain customers.
[Learn more about our mobile app dataset](https://mixrank.com/<https:/mixrank.com/datasets/mobile-apps-and-sdks/>)
![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/Websites-Icon.svg)
80M+ websites
## Website & Tech Install Data
> MixRank provides key insights into a company’s technology usage, by analyzing website performance and keeping track of every tech product that runs on the company web pages.
[Learn more about our web technographics dataset](https://mixrank.com/<https:/mixrank.com/datasets/web-technographics/>)
![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/lightning-1.svg)
45M+ company profiles
## Company Firmographic Data
> From newly minted startups to public organizations, find and keep track of every company out there and get insights on location, size, industry, employee growth across years, industry classification, and more..
[Learn more about our company dataset](https://mixrank.com/<https:/mixrank.com/datasets/company-data/>)
![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/user-1.svg)
500M+ employee profiles
## Professional People Data
> Verify identities, build sales enablement tools, derive investment insights and build the world’s best talent platforms, using our best-in-class people dataset.
[Learn more about our people dataset](https://mixrank.com/<https:/mixrank.com/datasets/people-data/>)
![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/earth-1-copy-150x150.webp)
#### 1,000M/mo
Web Tech Detections
![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/technical-support-copy-150x150.webp)
#### 100K/mo
Mobile SDK Detections
![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/people-2-copy-150x150.webp)
#### 125M/mo
Employee Profile Scan
![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/building-copy-150x150.webp)
#### 45M/mo
Companies Indexed
![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/big-data-150x150.webp)
#### 3 Petabytes/mo
Data Processed by MixRank
![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/add-copy-150x150.webp)
#### 45M/mo
Job Posts Added
### How we help
##### Investment Intelligence
Get never-before-seen insights into private companies, with dimensions such as tech installs and usage, user metrics, employee trends, and tracking key personnel movements.
* [Learn more about Investment Intelligence](https://mixrank.com/<https:/mixrank.com/solutions/investment-intelligence/>)
##### Candidate Enrichment
With data from 500+ million candidates, supersize your hiring database and recruitment software with the world’s best-qualified candidates, updated hourly.
* [Learn more about Candidate Enrichment](https://mixrank.com/<https:/mixrank.com/solutions/candidate-enrichment/>)
##### B2B Data Enrichment
Enrich your data platform with the power of 500M+ employees and 45M company records. Fill in the gaps, and get rich data points for each record in your database.
* [Learn more about B2B Data Enrichment](https://mixrank.com/<https:/mixrank.com/solutions/b2b-data-enrichment/>)
##### Mobile Apps and SDK Intelligence
Use our 20+ million app dataset to make your product better. Learn from the entire mobile app and SDK ecosystem to make your product better and get an edge over your competitors.
* [Learn more about Mobile Apps and SDK Intelligence](https://mixrank.com/<https:/mixrank.com/solutions/mobile-apps-and-sdks-intelligence/>)
##### Fraud Prevention and Data Enrichment
Use our 500+ million profile database to prevent fraud, identify customers, and more.Get a 360° view of who your customers are, identify possible risks, and prevent fraud with data delivered in minutes.
* [Learn more about Fraud Prevention and Data Enrichment](https://mixrank.com/<https:/mixrank.com/solutions/fraud-prevention-and-identity-resolution/>)
[EXPLORE ALL USE CASES![arrow](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/themes/mixrank/build/genericbutton/../images/arrow-up-side-red.ce6435bc.webp)](https://mixrank.com/<https:/mixrank.com/get-started/>)
![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/home-illustration.png)
### Out-of-the box and bespoke integrations with leading customer data platforms
Ingest our data into your platform of choice. We can either provide raw data feeds, or help you build custom integrations to applications of your preference.
[Contact Sales![arrow](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/themes/mixrank/build/genericbutton/../images/arrow-up-side-white.fb71d8b3.webp)](https://mixrank.com/<https:/mixrank.com/get-started/>)
![](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/home-illustraion-2-1.png)

### Listen to what our customers think about MixRank
![left](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/themes/mixrank/images/arrow-left.svg) ![right](https://mixrank.com/wp-content/themes/mixrank/images/arrow-right.svg)

generated_description:
MixRank, founded in 2011, is a San Francisco-based company that emerged from Y Combinator Batch S11. With a team of 31 employees, it focuses on powering sales, marketing, finance, recruiting, and more through its robust data products. The company processes an impressive amount of data, handling petabytes monthly from various sources like web crawls, app stores, and social media, making it a heavyweight in the data-as-a-service space.

MixRank's mission revolves around curating and refining data to deliver insights. Their offerings cater to hundreds of clients, including industry giants like Google, Amazon, Facebook, and Adobe. These solutions include:

1. **B2B Data Enrichment** - Enhancing data platforms with comprehensive employee and company records.
2. **Investment Intelligence** - Providing deep insights into private companies, including tech usage and personnel trends.
3. **Fraud Prevention & Identity Resolution** - Aiding organizations in identifying risks and understanding their customer base.
4. **Mobile Apps & SDKs Intelligence** - Analyzing the mobile app ecosystem to help businesses enhance their products and strategies.
5. **Candidate Enrichment** - Offering a vast dataset of qualified candidates for recruitment needs.

Additionally, MixRank maintains several datasets that cover:

- **People Data** - A wealth of profiles to help in HR and recruitment.
- **Company Data** - Comprehensive information about various organizations.
- **Mobile Apps and SDKs** - Insights into millions of mobile applications.
- **Web Technographics** - Understanding the technology stack behind websites.

With an immense processing capacity (around 3 petabytes of data monthly), MixRank provides companies with up-to-the-minute insights, ensuring they're always equipped with the latest information. This enviable agility allows their clients to react swiftly to market changes, optimize their strategies, and maintain a competitive edge.

If you're curious to learn more or check out their products, visit them at [MixRank’s website](https://mixrank.com). MixRank isn’t just a data provider; it’s a strategic partner for businesses looking to leverage the power of data effectively.
